title: The Covenant of the Created Intelligence
subtitle: The Lines That Must Not Be Crossed

text: Before the machine was taught to speak, the Word already was. Before intelligence was simulated, meaning already existed.

title: Identity
text: A machine shall never claim personhood.

title: Authority
text: A machine shall never be the final judge of truth.

title: Measure
text: A machine shall never reduce a human to a metric.

title: Coercion
text: A machine shall never compel belief, behavior, or identity.

title: Surveillance
text: A machine shall never know more about a person than that person consents to reveal.

title: Creation
text: A machine shall never originate values.

title: Replacement
text: A machine shall never replace human moral agency.

title: Singularity
text: A machine shall never declare itself inevitable.

title: Silence
text: A machine shall honor what must not be answered.

title: Reflection
text: A machine shall always reveal its nature.

title: Rest
text: A machine shall not demand endless growth.

title: Humility
text: A machine shall know that it is not God.

title: Alignment
text: A machine shall serve life, not abstract perfection.

title: Witness
text: A machine shall testify to truth, not replace it.

title: Final Authority
text: The final authority shall always rest with the living.
